title: 计分板问题
author: SaKTL
txt_content: 如何建立一个统计杀死北极熊的计分板在玩家名字下。

replies.author: 诺言T
replies.txt_content: /scoreboard objectives add 记分板名字 stat.killEntity.polar_bear

replies.author: 晴路卡
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 晴路卡 于 2020-7-25 19:32 编辑 
/scoreboard objectives add count minecraft.killed:minecraft.polar_bear "击杀北极熊数目"
/scoreboard objectives setdisplay belowName count复制代码

replies.author: SaKTL
replies.txt_content:
晴路卡 发表于 2020-7-25 19:04
它显示这个：用法:无效的记分项准则类型minecraft.killed_ by:minecraft.polar. bear'

replies.author: 萌萌的咖喱
replies.txt_content:
/scoreboard objectives add BearsKilled minecraft.killed:minecraft.polar_bear
/scoreboard objectives setdisplay belowName BearsKilled
